entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
